Priors¶

Prior probability distributions for Bayesian inference.

class optimparameters.priors.Gaussian(mu, sig)¶

A Gaussian prior.

Attr:

mu (float): The mean (center) of the Gaussian distribution. sig (float): The standard deviation of the Gaussian distribution.

class optimparameters.priors.Prior¶

A base class for a Bayesian Prior.

class optimparameters.priors.Uniform(minv, maxv)¶

A Uniform prior.

Attr:

minv (float): The minimum value. maxv (float): The maximum value.
